name: Twinbee Taisen Puzzle Dama
overview: Twinbee Taisen Puzzle Dama is a competitive action-puzzle game featuring the characters and settings of the Twinbee games. Gameplay is similar to games like Puzzle Fighter or Puyo Puyo, you select a character and engage in one-on-one duels with other characters in which each player has its well in which different color-coded bells appear and must arrange them in series of three to clear them out and send "garbage" bells to the other player in order to halt his advance. The game features single and 2-player VS modes as well a story mode for each character.
